snippet.title: Cry Babies Magic Tears: The Big Game | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Your favourite Cry Babies Magic Tears characters are ready to play! Based on the best-selling toys and popular animated series, The Big Game finds Lady, Coney, Dreamy and friends in an all-new adventure as they take part in an exciting tournament across multiple worlds to win the fabled Golden Pacifier. Coming soon for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S and PC.
